item.description:
FREE ADMISSION, FOOD & SALSA LESSONS!

Ever want to learn to dance the Salsa or any of the exotic Latin dance moves but didn't know where to start? For no cost you can at the Drynk Nightclub & Lounge!

This is a time you won’t want to miss! So come join us at the Drynk night club & lounge in downtown Manchester, this Wednesday night and you WILL have FUN!

This cozy & romantic venue has a good selection of dining entrees should you wish to come early.

The roomy dance floor allows for several dancers & instructors with plenty of room to move and learn. The folks from the Royal Palace Dance Studio will make your evening experience here a memorable one. These young men and woman are professional dance instructors, and will personally help you master the basic Salsa dance as well as show you the more advanced, sexy Latin moves! You know you love to dance, you've probably seen how exciting that couple looks while dancing the Salsa. So why not spice up YOUR dance a bit? It’s time, and these instructors will make it happen for you right here at the Drynk.

Free Admission all night

Free Appetizers around 8:45pm

Free Salsa lessons; 9pm – 11pm

After 11:00pm open to all to practice and show your new moves!

At around 10:30 the general crowd (mostly puppies) start to arrive and the place fills up quickly with fun people that love to dance. It’s a great night out with FREE admission, appetizers, and Salsa lessons………..why would you ever want to miss this fun, free time!!!
item.name: ~ FREE SALSA LESSONS ~ Come Dance with Us!
